api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas
api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Creates the canvas that will be used for drawing on with BOOSE commands. Aswell as creating the bitmap and graphics context and defining the starting coordinates and colour for the pen. Inheritance object Canvas AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members Canvas.background_colour Canvas.Rectangle(int, int, bool) object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Namespace: BOOSEapp Assembly: BOOSEapp.dll Syntax public class AppCanvas : Canvas, ICanvas Constructors | Edit this page View Source AppCanvas(int, int) Defines the size of canvas bitmap and gets the graphic context from it. Declaration public AppCanvas(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters Type Name Description int xsize The width of the canvas in pixels int ysize The height of the canvas in pixels Properties | Edit this page View Source PenColour Declaration public override object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value Type Description object Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.PenColour | Edit this page View Source Xpos The setter and getter methods for the x and y coordinations of the pen Declaration public override int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value Type Description int Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.Xpos | Edit this page View Source Ypos Declaration public override int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value Type Description int Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.Ypos Methods | Edit this page View Source Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle at the position stated with the stated radius. the topleft value is calculated by subtracting the radius from the current position. Declaration public override void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters Type Name Description int radius The radius of the circle in pixels bool filled Whether the circle is filled or not Overrides Canvas.Circle(int, bool) | Edit this page View Source Clear() Clears the canvas by filling it with a white background. Declaration public override void Clear() Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.Clear() | Edit this page View Source DrawTo(int, int) Draw a line from to current cursor position to the provided x,y position. By using the pens current position position and then uodating the pen position to the new x,y position. Declaration public override void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters Type Name Description int x The X coordinate to draw to int y The Y coordinate to draw to Overrides Canvas.DrawTo(int, int) | Edit this page View Source MoveTo(int, int) Updates the position of the pen to the provided x,y coordinates. Declaration public override void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters Type Name Description int x The X coordinate to move to int y The Y coordinate to move to Overrides Canvas.MoveTo(int, int) | Edit this page View Source Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle at the current pen position with the provided width and height in pixels Declaration public override void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters Type Name Description int width Width of the rectangle in pixels int height Height of the rectangle in pixels bool filled Whether the rectangle should be filled Overrides Canvas.Rect(int, int, bool) | Edit this page View Source Reset() Declaration public override void Reset() Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.Reset() | Edit this page View Source Set(int, int) Declaration public override void Set(int width, int height) Parameters Type Name Description int width int height Overrides Canvas.Set(int, int) | Edit this page View Source SetColour(int, int, int) Takes an RGB value and creates a new pen with that colour Declaration public override void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters Type Name Description int red Red colour component (0–255). int green Green colour component (0–255). int blue Blue colour component (0–255). Overrides Canvas.SetColour(int, int, int) | Edit this page View Source Tri(int, int) Declaration public override void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters Type Name Description int width int height Overrides Canvas.Tri(int, int) | Edit this page View Source WriteText(string) Declaration public override void WriteText(string text) Parameters Type Name Description string text Overrides Canvas.WriteText(string) | Edit this page View Source getBitmap() Clones the bitmap so that the PictureBox doesn't dispose of it when updating the image. Declaration public override object getBitmap() Returns Type Description object Overrides BOOSE.Canvas.getBitmap() Implements BOOSE.ICanvas

api/BOOSEapp.html.title: Namespace BOOSEapp
api/BOOSEapp.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEapp Classes AppCanvas Creates the canvas that will be used for drawing on with BOOSE commands. Aswell as creating the bitmap and graphics context and defining the starting coordinates and colour for the pen. AppCircle Unrestricted implementation of the Circle command for the BOOSE system. AppMoveto Unrestricted implementation of the Moveto command for the BOOSE system. AppRect Unrestricted implementation of the Rect command for drawing rectangles on the canvas. Form1 The main window form that the BOOSE app runs in. Provides the user interface for typing and executing BOOSE commands.
